amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account to the FY2018 funding level by giving the Weapons Activities account a $404 million increase.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to restore the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account to the FY2018 funding level by giving the Weapons Activities account a $404 million increase.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 239 (Roll no. 248).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Connolly.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 239 (Roll no. 248).
